## üìù Sample Queries

### View customers data

Retrieve sample records from customers

```sql
SELECT * FROM customers LIMIT 10;
```

### View sellers data

Retrieve sample records from sellers

```sql
SELECT * FROM sellers LIMIT 10;
```

### View products data

Retrieve sample records from products

```sql
SELECT * FROM products LIMIT 10;
```

### Join orders with customers

Combine data from related tables

```sql
SELECT a.*, b.*
FROM orders a
JOIN customers b ON a.customer_id = b.customer_id
LIMIT 10;
```

### Join order_items with sellers

Combine data from related tables

```sql
SELECT a.*, b.*
FROM order_items a
JOIN sellers b ON a.seller_id = b.seller_id
LIMIT 10;
```

### Join order_items with products

Combine data from related tables

```sql
SELECT a.*, b.*
FROM order_items a
JOIN products b ON a.product_id = b.product_id
LIMIT 10;
```

### Aggregate order_items

Summary statistics for order_items

```sql
SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as total_records,
    SUM(price) as total_amount,
    AVG(price) as avg_amount
FROM order_items;
```
